title: Introducing Coach Jack - The Most Flexible Cycling Training Plan Builder

transcript.full_text: hello meet coach jack and trainer day's ultra flexible plan builder coach jack is a virtual coach that will help you create the perfect plan to meet your training objectives in recent years professional coaches and sports scientists have begun speaking out about the growing body of evidence that spending too much time doing hard workouts is not the optimum way to get faster i emphasize too much versus just the right amount jack believes that training should be fun and you should train smarter not harder all of the plans in coach jack's plan builder are based on well-established training fundamentals there are two or three simple steps to working with jack at first you have two options you can skip jack's recommendations and go right to the plan builder or if you want recommendations you must connect to strava and then answer a few assessment questions by looking at your strata history and your goals jack will suggest an appropriate plan for you you can see here that once jack has given you this recommended plan you can tweak all the sliders and controls to fine-tune this plan as you would like all of your changes will be applied against the standard set of rules that are common quality training fundamentals once you're happy you can push the plan to my plans which allows further full control the final and last step is distributing your plan to your preferred training platform that might be zwift training peaks garmin intervals icu as well as our training app thank you very much
